Room.Name: Center Courtyard South
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the southern end of Prince Ragnar's castle courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: To the north is a vast expanse of courtyard used for all manner of castle activities. To the east is an enclosed garden area, while to the west is a small arms practice area. The great castle's storage rooms are located through the tunnel running to the south. The smell of animals is wafted from the animal keep directly to the south, near the tunnel entrance.
